body:
Hi Doompop,

Do you have any example of results of the VSC calculation that you can share with me. I wrote a component for Honeybee to calculate VSC based on this discussion ([http://www.radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2006-Sept...](http://www.radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2006-September/004017.html)). The results makes sense to me but still I would like to double check the results with some examples before the first release.

Thanks,

Mostapha
